events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all and I would like to return it.
The customer's request has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the mention of a refund and return.
The case was assigned to support agent Emily Richardson, who specializes in handling refund requests.
Hello! This is Emily from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket order. I'm here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund, so I can process your request more quickly?
Sure, my order number is 784392. The jacket was too small despite ordering my usual size, so I would prefer to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid label â€” makes the return much easier for me.
I have marked your refund case as resolved. Once we receive the returned jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to check if you have any further questions or concerns regarding your refund.
Yes, I sent back the jacket yesterday using the prepaid label. I haven't received the refund yet but I will wait a few more days, thanks!
Since the refund payment has been processed successfully and the customer is satisfied, this case has now been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
